paper_abstract: In this letter, we propose a innovative threshold receiver for MIMO-OFDM system. The proposed scheme calculates the channel condition number and then selects either combined V algorithm and CLLL or combined QRD-M and DFE detection scheme according to channel information. The complexity of the proposed scheme is about 33.3% of the QRD-M for 4 x 4 MIMO-OFDM system.
paper_title: Channel Condition Number Based Switching Detection Scheme in MIMO-OFDM System
